verbose_text: Afterwards, PA is dephosphorylated by phosphatidic acid phosphatase (PAP; EC 3.1.3.4) to generate sn-1,2-diacylglycerol (DAG), followed by the final acylation at the sn-3 position of sn-1, 2-DAG to produce TAG, catalysed by diacylglycerol acyltransferase (DGAT; EC 3.2.1.20) using acyl-CoA as the acyl donor.
evidence: PA is dephosphorylated by phosphatidic acid phosphatase
